title: Anbe Anbe Ne En Pillai Song Lyrics Uyirodu Uyiraga
stanzas:
Anbe Anbe Ne En Pillai Song Lyrics Uyirodu Uyiraga
#Vidyasagar #Hariharan #KSChitra

anbe anbe
nee en pillai.
dhegam mattum
kaadhal illai.

bhoomiyil naam
vaazhum kaalam dhorum
unmaiyil un jeevan
ennai serum (2)

anbe anbe
nee en pillai.
dhegam mattum
kaadhal illai.

kannaa en koondhalil
soodum pon pookkalum
unnai unnai azhaikka

kanne un kaivalai
meettum sangeethangal
ennai ennai uraikka

kangalaith thirandhu kondu
naan kanavugal kaanugiren
kangalai moodi kondu
naan kaatchigal thedugiren
un pon viral thodugaiyile
naan poovaai maarugiren

bhoomiyil naam
vaazhum kaalam dhorum
unmaiyil en jeevan
unnai serum

anbe anbe
nee en pillai.
dhegam mattum
kaadhal illai.

yaarai pen enbathu
yaarai aan enbathu
ondril ondru adanga

uchiyil thaen vizhunthu
en uyirukkul inikkuthadi
mannagam maranthu vitten
Â enai maatrungal pazhaiyapadi

bhoomiyil naam vaazhum
kaalam dhorum
unmaiyil un jeevan
ennai serum
